summary: A racemenu preset for my character Runa (Face Only)
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]I'm assuming you know the drill. This is a Racemenu Preset of one of my many characters, called Runa.

[u][b]Race:[/b][/u] Nord

[u][b]Body Type:[/b][/u] In the screenshots i'm using 7BO but since this is an "only face" preset you can use whatever you like.

[u][b]Skin:[/b][/u] Use whichever you like the most although i highly recommend the more "doll-like" ones like [b]Demoniac[/b], [b]Pure Skin[/b] or [b]Fair Skin[/b]. Any of those should do the trick. Other "rougher" skins may not look so good with the face. (In the screenshots i'm using Pure Skin)

 - - - - - - - - - -

[u][b]Required Mods

[/b][/u] - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] (dah!)
 - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?]Mikan Eyes[/url]
 - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]
 - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url]

 - - - - - - - - - -

[u][b]Optional Mods[/b][/u]

Now, if you want that little bit of body hair in the belly you'll need [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78789/?]Nordic Warmaiden Hair[/url]

 - - - - - - - - - -

[b]All the credits go to the authors of these amazing mods that make possible the creation of beautiful characters![/b]

[b] - - - - - - - - - -

[u]Instructions[/u][/b]

Install the required/suggested mods. Then extract the file and just drop it on your racemenu presets' folder (the location may vary depending on which mod manager you use if any at all, a quick google search should help you, but it should be a folder with this structure "skse\plugins\CharGen\Presets")

 - - - - - - - - - -

[b][u]FAQ[/u][/b]

 - Why is it a face only preset?
   Because i used to have all my characters created on CBBE and with a lot of Racemenu Morphs modifications on top of a custom bodyslide preset and sharing a preset like that would've been a lot more difficult not just for me but for whoever wanted to use it. But recently i changed to 7BO since the most amazing outfits are for UNP bodies and the face preset goes perfectly fine with almost any body really, cbbe or unp.

 - What ENB are you using?
   Snapdragon ENB.

 - Can you make her into a follower?
   [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90783]Done[/url].

 - Can i make her into a follower?
   No need, I already did :) [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90783]Here[/url].

 - Can you upload this to "X" website? No. Nexus is perfectly fine and objectively the best mod site in the entire internet. If you don't like it, i don't know what you're doing here :)

 - - - - - - - - - -

Feel free to leave your comments and/or share any amount of screenshots.

I think that's all. Let me know if i missed something.

If you want to see my other characters (over 15 different ones) check my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3483357/?tb=images&pUp=1]Image Section here on Nexus[/url] and maybe i'll upload other presets in the future (face only).[/size]
author: germanware
